TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SentenceCache extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class SentenceCache Implements IDisposable

Docs.summary: Caches the last sentence(s) of each type and so provides a way of asking for the current position without waiting for the next message

Docs.summary: Gets the last sentence of the given type. Does not return sentences that are part of a group (i.e. GSV, RTE)
Docs.returns: The last sentence of that type, or null.

Docs.summary: Gets the last sentence of the given type. Does not return sentences that are part of a group (i.e. GSV, RTE)
Docs.returns: The last sentence of that type, or null if none was received within the given timespan.

Docs.summary: True to (also) store raw sentences. Otherwise only recognized decoded sentences are stored. Defaults to false.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryGetCurrentPosition (out Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition? position, out UnitsNet.Angle track, out UnitsNet.Speed sog, out UnitsNet.Angle? heading);

.method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetCurrentPosition([out] class Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition& position, [out] valuetype UnitsNet.Angle& track, [out] valuetype UnitsNet.Speed& sog, [out] valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype UnitsNet.Angle>& heading) cil managed
Public Function TryGetCurrentPosition (ByRef position As GeographicPosition, ByRef track As Angle, ByRef sog As Speed, ByRef heading As Nullable(Of Angle)) As Boolean
member this.TryGetCurrentPosition : GeographicPosition * Angle * Speed * Nullable -> bool

Docs.summary: Get the current position from the latest message containing any of the relevant data parts. This does not extrapolate the position if the last received message is old
Docs.returns: True if a valid position is returned

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryGetCurrentPosition (out Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition? position, bool extrapolate, out UnitsNet.Angle track, out UnitsNet.Speed sog, out UnitsNet.Angle? heading);

.method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetCurrentPosition([out] class Iot.Device.Common.GeographicPosition& position, bool extrapolate, [out] valuetype UnitsNet.Angle& track, [out] valuetype UnitsNet.Speed& sog, [out] valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype UnitsNet.Angle>& heading) cil managed
Public Function TryGetCurrentPosition (ByRef position As GeographicPosition, extrapolate As Boolean, ByRef track As Angle, ByRef sog As Speed, ByRef heading As Nullable(Of Angle)) As Boolean
member this.TryGetCurrentPosition : GeographicPosition * bool * Angle * Speed * Nullable -> bool

Docs.param: True to extrapolate the current position using speed and track
Docs.summary: Get the current position from the latest message containing any of the relevant data parts. If is true, the speed and direction are used to extrapolate the position (many older GNSS receivers only deliver the position at 1Hz or less)
Docs.returns: True if a valid position is returned

Docs.param: Receives the sentence, if any was found
